message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Given its importance, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special price tailored to your needs. Considering the product's worth to you and its market value, I propose a price of $950,000. This offer allows you to secure a valuable asset at a price that is higher than your valuation but still below its market value, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.
